thoughts.text: EF offers language courses, cultural exchange programs, academic programs, and corporate education programs for individuals and companies of all ages and levels. They also offer au pair programs for young adults. EF has offices worldwide and provides online English language courses through EF English Live. They also have a private international school, EF Academy, and a business school, Hult International Business School. I should compare the services offered by EF with those offered by other language schools to make a more informed decision.
thoughts.reasoning: Comparing the services offered by different language schools will help me make an informed decision.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to browse other language school websites
- Take notes on the programs that interest me
- Compare the options and decide on a course or destination to pursue first
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am not getting overwhelmed by too many options and that I am making a decision in a timely manner.
thoughts.speak: EF offers language courses, cultural exchange programs, academic programs, and corporate education programs for individuals and companies of all ages and levels. They also offer au pair programs for young adults. EF has offices worldwide and provides online English language courses through EF English Live. They also have a private international school, EF Academy, and a business school, Hult International Business School. I should compare the services offered by EF with those offered by other language schools to make a more informed decision.

args.query: top language schools in the world
